ComicInfo.Title: Dead Love
ComicInfo.Summary:
At last! The volume you’ve been waiting for is here! And it’s a massive 74 pages with special widescreen, panoramic scenes of the Vampires Banquet and Vampire Pride Day celebrating Count Dracula’s triumphant return to Necropolis. But Black Sabbat, Lady Claudia, Cryptos and their fellow conspirators’ plans to overthrow Dracula finally come together in this all-action penultimate story before the epic time- and dimension-spanning saga of Vampires, Ghouls, Zombies and Werewolves concludes.
And Requiem is united with the great love of his life Rebecca. But now he is dead and there is no love in Hell. Instead, there is a terrifying final confrontation with Otto in the ruins of World War Two Berlin. And the recognition of who Requiem truly is before he meets Dracula again, thousands of years after the Count ordered his once beloved son to be torn apart by wild horses.
All superbly dramatically and humorously visualized by France’s number one science fantasy artist Olivier Ledroit, and written by Britain’s legendary creator of 2000AD, Pat Mills.
You haven't lived until you've died…
ComicInfo.Notes: Info grabbed from gumroad for Millsverse itself. Page discrepancy is because the quadruple page was given in the digital edition as a single image, this is complete and as publisher intended.
